CONTRACT_ID: W857A-24VA01 - Responsive Maintenance Services - CFHA - Valcartier
short_summary: Cost-effective maintenance and minor improvement services for crown-owned properties in Valcartier, Quebec. The Department of National Defence (DND) and the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC).
full_summary:
.appendix Details of Contract Announcement
=====================================

### Reporting Information

* **Reference**: WS4213694242
* **Publication Date**: 2023-12-04
* **Amendment Number**: 4
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4213694242

### Tender Information

* **Title (English)**: W857A-24VA01 - Responsive Maintenance Services - CFHA - Valcartier
* **Title (French)**: W857A-24VA01 - Services de maintenance réactifs - ALFC - Valcartier
* **Status**: Expired

### Contract Details

* **Expected Contract Start Date**: None
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2026-03-31
* **Regions of Delivery**: Quebec

### Goods and Services

* The contract is for cost-effective maintenance and minor improvement services for the Crown-owned portfolio.
* UNSPSC codes: *Flooring, *Residential painting service, *Carpentry services, *Roofing service, *Cleaning and janitorial services

### Procurement Details

* **Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, and others

### Contact Information

* **Organization**: Department of National Defence (DND)
* **Address**: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A0K2
* **Person Responsible**: Quinn, Carine Thibodeau (SPAC/PSPC)

### Notice and Attachment

* **Notice URL**: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18183304?extsite=MTgxODMzMDRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18183304?extsite=MTgxODMzMDRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
* **Attachments**: None

The responses deadline closing time has been amended to February 2, 2024 at 14:00 EST. Bidders are expected to submit their supporting documentation and bid by the specified deadline. Bidders who submit their bid after 14:00 EST will be declared non-responsive. Offerors must communicate with the Standing Offer Authority by December 15, 2023 at 14:00 EST to confirm
